name: surviving murky waters - sandytoes2211
description: at age 18 i became a certified scuba diver and as my parting gift, my instructor raped and almost strangled me. i screamed and pleaded with him to let me go but he choked me and made me comply. the next day, i was told that my screams were heard by his employee but no one came to help me. that was the first time i was not under the protection of my father or my brother. it was a rude awakening to the real world and the brutality of what many girls, women, trans, boys, and men face everyday. i had to keep going and not let it destroy me. i signed up for a safety class and about a year later my boss at the cafe i worked at, locked the doors and tried to rape me. this time, i was ready for it! i knew what was coming and was going to try to survive it better. i kept my cool and did not flinch when he grabbed me and kissed me hard. i stood like a rock and he slowly let go of me, surprised at my reaction. i remained very calm and used what words i had to plead and ask for him to not rape me. to my surprise, it worked. he let me go. i never reported anything. i swam the murky waters of self loathing and healed my pain.
